snippet: In a nation riven by protests over corruption and overspending, a lawmaker used an Air Force jet to bring guests to the Spain-Brazil soccer match.
abstract: Brazilian lawmaker Henrique Eduardo Alves uses air force jet paid for with taxpayer money to bring guests to Spain-Brazil soccer match, igniting controversy in nation riven by protests over corruption and overspending.
lead_paragraph: In a nation riven by protests over corruption and overspending, a lawmaker used an Air Force jet to bring guests to the Spain-Brazil soccer match.

headline.main: For Brazilian Official and Family, Controversy Over a Trip
headline.print_headline: For Brazilian Official and Family, Controversy Over a Trip
